thread.title: Donald Trump 2016 campaign raises $3.9 million
thread.title_full: Donald Trump 2016 campaign raises $3.9 million - POLITICO

author: Glenn Thrush
title: Donald Trump 2016 campaign raises $3.9 million
text:
Donald Trump's campaign raised nearly $4 million in the third quarter of this year. Trump himself contributed $100,779, according to a statement from his campaign. "To be number one in every poll, both state and national, and to have spent the least amount of dollars of any serious candidate is a testament to what I can do for America," said Trump in the statement. "This is what our country's leaders should do for the United States — spend money wisely and win!"
"Mr. Trump is self-funding his campaign; however there were 73,942 unsolicited donations during this time period with an average contribution of $50.46," said the statement.
Below is a breakout of the campaign’s finances as of the end of September.
Total raised: $3,926,511
Total spent: $4,035,076
Debt: $1,804,747
Total cash on hand: $254,772
